links.title: $EVTC EVERTEC Declares Quarterly Dividend on Common Stock
links.description: EVERTEC, Inc. (NYSE: EVTC) is a leading full-service transaction processing business in Latin America, providing a broad range of merchant acquiring, payment processing and business solutions services. The Company manages a system of electronic payment networks that process more than two billion transactions annually and offers a comprehensive suite of services for core bank processing, cash processing and technology outsourcing.

links.title: $EVTC Evertec Awards Over 160 Scholarships
links.description: EVERTEC, Inc. (NYSE: EVTC) ("Evertec" or the "Company") announced today the results of its 6th edition of its Scholarship Program, granting over 160 scholarships to university students in Puerto Rico and throughout Latin America for an investment exceeding $185,000.

messages.body: $EVTC EVERTEC to Announce Third Quarter 2020 Financial Results on October 29, 2020 https://www.otcdynamics.com/evtc-evertec-to-announce-third-quarter-2020-financial-results-on-october-29-2020

links.title: $EVTC EVERTEC to Announce Third Quarter 2020 Financial Results on October 29, 2020
links.description: EVERTEC, Inc. (NYSE: EVTC) ("Evertec" or the "Company") today announced that it will host a conference call and webcast on Thursday, October 29, 2020 at 4:30 p.m. ET to review third quarter financial results. Participating on the call will be Mac Schuessler, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Joaquin Castrillo, Chief Financial Officer.

links.description: SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico--()--EVERTEC, Inc. (NYSE: EVTC) ("Evertec" or the "Company") today announced that it will host a conference call and webcast on Thursday, October 29, 2020 at 4:30 p.m. ET to review third quarter financial results. Participating on the call will be Mac Schuessler, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Joaquin Castrillo, Chief Financial Officer.
